sect2.title: Installation of Pine
sect2.para: Download the pine FHS patch from .
Install Pine by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../pine-&pine-version;-fhs.patch && ./build slx MAILSPOOL='/var/mail' \ SSLDIR=/usr SSLCERTS=/etc/ssl/certs && cp doc/pine.1 doc/pico.1 doc/rpdump.1 doc/rpload.1 /usr/share/man/man1 && cd bin && install pine imapd ipop2d ipop3d mailutil mtest pico pilot rpdump \ rpload /usr/bin
